nodes.beat: Little Red Riding Hood, a player in the Minecraft world, receives an in-game message from her sick grandmother.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her some healing potions from the nearby village.
Little Red, wearing her red armor, ventures out with her trusty steed.
En route, Little Red encounters a stranger, a cunning player, who learns about her mission.
The player manipulates the game's environment to mislead Little Red.
Misled, Little Red ends up in a dangerous mob-infested cave.
Realizing the trick, Little Red uses her mining skills to escape the cave.
Little Red exposes the player to the game's moderators and continues her journey to her grandmother's house.
Little Red delivers the healing potions and they have a virtual family gathering via video call.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her a special enchanted book from the stronghold.
The player traps Little Red in a redstone contraption.
Little Red, using her knowledge of redstone, escapes the trap and reports the player.
Little Red finds the enchanted book and delivers it to her grandmother.
Little Red Riding Hood, a popular Minecraft streamer, announces a live stream to visit her grandmother.
Little Red's live stream attracts the attention of a griefer.
The griefer tries to destroy Little Red's path using TNT.
The griefer tries to flood Little Red's path with water and lava.
Little Red, noticing the disruption, uses her building skills to avoid the flood.
Little Red's viewers, united, report the griefer leading to his ban.

outputs.options:

Storylines: 4, 
Settings: Minecraft
